doc:
Richard Karlan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Karlan 0 Richard Karlan (April 24, 1919 – September 10, 2004) was an American actor. He appeared in the films Snow Dog, Union Station, Between Midnight and Dawn, The Lemon Drop Kid, Love Is Better Than Ever, The Racket, Wait till the Sun Shines, Nellie, Tangier Incident, Blowing Wild, All the Brothers Were Valiant, Captain Kidd and the Slave Girl, Abbott and Costello Meet the Mummy, The Steel Jungle, Accused of Murder, Hollywood or Bust, Rock All Night, The Crooked Circle, The Man Who Died Twice, Inside the Mafia and Star!, among others. He died of pneumonia on September 10, 2004, in Los Angeles, California at age 85. Richard_Karlan ( April_24_,_1919 – September_10_,_2004 ) was an_American_actor . He appeared in the_films_Snow_Dog , Union_Station , Between Midnight_and_Dawn , The_Lemon_Drop_Kid , Love Is Better Than Ever , The_Racket , Wait till the_Sun_Shines , Nellie , Tangier_Incident , Blowing_Wild , All_the_Brothers Were Valiant , Captain_Kidd and the_Slave_Girl , Abbott and Costello_Meet the_Mummy , The_Steel_Jungle , Accused of Murder , Hollywood_or_Bust , Rock_All_Night , The_Crooked_Circle , The_Man Who Died Twice , Inside the_Mafia_and_Star ! , among others . He died of pneumonia on September_10_,_2004 , in Los_Angeles , California at age_85 .
